detail_desc: Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide elastication at the waist and ventilating mesh sections.
Plastic gift box containing five adjustable metal rings with various decorations.
High-waisted, stretch twill trousers in a viscose blend with a sheen. Zip fly with a button and slim legs.

Short dress in mesh made from recycled polyester with a sequin-embroidered pattern. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and an embroidered scalloped edge at the top and hem. Jersey lining.
Cigarette trousers in linen and viscose twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs with creases.
Shopper with two handles and a tie fastening with metal pendants. Unlined. Size 12x32x33 cm.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit with a fabric appliqué on the turned-up hem.

Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and small embroidered detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, hood and small appliqué at the top. Zip down the front, side pockets and a contrasting-colour jersey trim around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved jersey tops in a soft cotton blend. Slim fit.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a brushed finish and appliqué at the top. Round neckline with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and a seam and flared flounce at the hem.
Long-sleeved nightdress in printed jersey with a button placket, cuffed sleeves and a rounded hem.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, side pockets and raw edges. No fasteners.
Short dress in an airy patterned weave with a small stand-up collar with buttons at the back of the neck, an elasticated waist and long sleeves with a seam and flared cuffs. Unlined.
Trousers in patterned chiffon with an elasticated waist and wide, straight legs.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Short, V-neck dress in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves, an elasticated seam with a drawstring under the bust, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, reflective details and soft fleece inside. Detachable hood with soft fleece inside, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif and slits in the sides of the hem.
Body in textured jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, shaped, lined cups and press-studs at the crotch.
Top in soft jersey with short butterfly sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication at the top and silicone on the inside of the heels for a better fit.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Fitted top in soft, patterned jersey with short, flounced sleeves.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and button placket. Drawstring at the sides, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a rib-knit fold-up hem.

Knee-length dress in soft denim with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with a pleated V-neck front and back, concealed zip in the side and gathered seam at the waist with a flared skirt. Satin lining.
Studs in various sizes and designs. One smooth pair, two pairs decorated with sparkly stones and one pair with a flower design. Diameter 0.4-1 cm.
High-waisted leggings in microfibre with a wide waist panel. The leggings are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Backpack in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede section on the front and a handle and zip at the top. Adjustable shoulder straps and two zipped outer compartments. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Depth 9 cm. Width 23 cm. Height 31 cm.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded shaft, elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Set with a short-sleeved dress and pair of 3/4-length leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Dress with a flounce at the hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
High-waisted jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a motif on the front, ribbing around the neckline, slits in the sides and long sleeves with roll edges.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Long-sleeved nursing top in soft viscose jersey with a wrapover front and a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, ties at the back of the neck, an open back and wide, sewn-on ties at the front of the waist.

Dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a seam with a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Top in sequin-embroidered mesh with a stand-up collar and long sleeves. Jersey lining.
Short dungaree dress in soft cotton twill with buttons down the front, adjustable straps with metal fasteners and patch front pockets. Unlined.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in woven fabric with notch lapels, short cap sleeves and concealed pockets in the side seams. Seam at the waist with a drawstring at the front and elastication at the back, and wide, straight legs.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved shirt in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a resort collar, French front and yoke with a pleat at the back.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Large earrings in metal and plastic with round pendants in various sizes and designs. Length approx. 10 cm.

Bootees in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with elastication around the ankles and top. Soft fleece linings and insoles and soft soles. The bootees have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

prod_name: Hannibal woven l/l PJ SB ES
detail_desc: Pyjamas with a jersey T-shirt top and bottoms in woven fabric. T-shirt with a woven fabric chest pocket. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a faceted sparkly button at the top and long sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable double shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Narrow waist belt with a pouch that can be worn as a stylish waist bag. The pouch has a flap and press-stud. Size of pouch 11x16.5 cm. Width of belt 2.5 cm.

Short dress in an airy organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and short, voluminous puff sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam under the bust and a scalloped hem. Lining in jersey made from recycled polyester.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, classic front, chest pocket and rounded hem. Easy-iron finish.
Pull-on trousers in a softly draping weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Long, halterneck dress in airy chiffon with beaded details. Opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck and a seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back and has a band of beads and sequins at the front. Lined.
Long, V-neck cardigan in soft, textured jersey with buttons at the top and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with a turtle neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey.
Short dress in crinkled jersey with a slight sheen. Deep V-neck, a wrapover front with a wide belt and a round, plastic buckle at one side.
Non-wired, lace push-up bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Ankle-length chinos in stretch cotton with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hems with creases.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round, ribbed neckline.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Fitted slub jersey top made from organic cotton with a V-neck and long sleeves.

Short dress in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a sheen. Round neckline with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves, wide smocking over the bust for a gathered effect and a softly draping skirt. Partly lined.

Bralette in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Double, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Decorative, crossover straps at the front and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Wide shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Soft ankle boots in imitation suede. Faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
